column4: X will not run as a normal user, only root, permissions all look good, the log gives me nothing
I did a minimal server install of breezy and installed Xorg and Xfce4, but X will only run as root
did you install both x-window-system-core and xubuntu-desktop?
yeah ubuntu-desktop wants all the gnome libs and stuff, like 280M of d/l
it's funny because I get the X hash background and black x cursor then it just dies and nothing in the logs
I installed all the packages you said but I still can't load X as a normal user
I installed wdm, it loads but no matter what session I try to run it just dumps back to the login manager
startx as root works perfectly and puts me in xfce4
it wants a lot of them
trying for a minimal system, I'll figure it out, thanks for the ideas so far though
process is the same as for debian, but the pkg names have "linux" instead of "kernel"
